author: Margaret Talev
title: Axios-Ipsos Coronavirus Index: Rich sheltered, poor shafted as virus rages
description: Data: Axios/Ipsos survey. Margin of error ±2.8 points for full sample. Margin for subgroups ranges from ±5 to ±9 points. Chart: Naema Ahmed/Axios The coronavirus is spreading a dangerous strain of inequality. Better-off Americans are still getting paid and ar…
content:
The coronavirus is spreading a dangerous strain of inequality.
  • Better-off Americans are still getting paid and are free to work from home, while the poor are either forced to risk going out to work or lose their jobs.
